titles.title: National Credit Union Administration Budget Transparency Act
A bill to require the National Credit Union Administration to hold public hearings and receive comments from the public on its budget, and for other purposes.
National Credit Union Administration Budget Transparency Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
National Credit Union Administration Budget Transparency Act
This bill amends the Federal Credit Union Act to require the National Credit Union Administration Board, before the annual submission of its required detailed business-type budget, to: (1) print a draft of the budget in the Federal Register; (2) hold a public hearing to receive comments from the public on the draft; and (3) include in the required integral set of accounts statements in which the budget will address any of such comments.
